analysis: The project currently has a basic HTML structure with some CSS and JavaScript files. The theme needs to be updated to focus on black holes, including animated objects, slides, and pages related to black holes. The existing CSS and JavaScript files need to be enhanced to support this theme with appropriate animations and interactive elements.

improvements.description: Update the CSS to include a dark cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Add Egyptian-themed color palette and UI elements.
Enhance the JavaScript to include event handlers and functionality for animated objects, slides, and pages related to black holes. Ensure smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
